scripts.structure: mkdirp dist dist/css dist/img dist/js src src/js src/js/models src/js/views && touch webpack.config.js .babelrc .gitignore src/index.html src/js/index.js dist/index.html dist/css/style.css
scripts.packages: npm install --save-dev babel-core@6 babel-preset-env@1 babel-loader@7 html-webpack-plugin webpack@4 webpack-cli@3 webpack-dev-server@3 && npm install --save axios babel-polyfill@6
scripts.init: npm run structure && npm run packages
